title: Activate Faith Not Fear | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Activate Faith Not Fear | Joel Osteen
description:
What you choose to dwell on can determine what’s going to take root in your life. When you meditate on what God says about you, you’ll activate His supernatural power in your life.


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
